name: Duality (itch) (raddeveloper)
description:
Press 'Spacebar' to transform.

You can switch from the more agile 'kid' who can jump past the cactus, to the tall and heavy 'brute' who can destroy the flying predators. Note that the game's over when the kid touches a flying predator or when the brute touches the cactus.

Let's see how much you can score!
